thread.title: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour
thread.title_full: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour

title: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour
text: > Entertainment The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour FILE - In this June 28, 2015 file photo, The Weeknd performs at the BET Awards in Los Angeles. The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are among the acts slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. IHeartRadio announced Monday, Oct. 5, that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas.The Dec. 11 show at New Yorkâ€™s Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File)
